descriptionEN: A calculator made with JS, evaluating the calculation with algorithims of my own design using recursion.
Ray casting tests made with JS. Applied to simulate shadows.
body: Ray casting tests that began as an interest to the technique and ended up as a nice looking visual experience. I have some plans to implement the technique and visual style to a simple game engine as an exercise, as I think the look could be pretty cool in an interactive world. The program was done with pure JavaScript drawing on a canvas. The math heavy parts were inspired from different sources, such as http://geomalgorithms.com/ and Stack OverFlow. In the demo you can choose to view the rays that are being cast or ray-to-object collision points. You can also change the visual style and play around with the polygon generation or create your own polygons.

descriptionEN: A circle collision simulation test made with JS, motor built after https://www.vobarian.com/collisions/2dcollisions2.pdf ...
A minecraft plugin made with Java, aiming to give restricted spectator mode to server users.
A website created with React and Bootstrap as a learning experience and a way to showcase skills.
A locally played chess game made with Java.
A REST API done with PHP and communicated with via JS.
